messages.title: My Priorities for Mid Sussex
messages.content: Get Brexit Done and Invest in Our NHS, Schools and Police.

messages.title: Boost the Local Economy and Improve Our Infrastructure
messages.content: Mims will support Mid Sussex's businesses to grow and campaign for better infrastructure for the area to relieve road and rail congestion.

messages.title: A Strong Local Voice for Mid Sussex in Parliament
messages.content: Mims lives in Mid Sussex with her daughters and knows the community well. She is able to combine her local knowledge with the experience of getting things done in Westminster as a Government Minister.

quotes.text: John Curtice: Polls teeter between hung parliament and slim Tory majority.
The Lib Dems have ruled out a coalition with the Conservatives. So a hung parliament means Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister. With five long years of gridlock and uncertainty.
Jo Swinson says no to second Tory alliance
SNP to back Labour government only with Scottish independence vote
